metadata.title: CVE-2022-27404 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
FreeType commit 1e2eb65048f75c64b68708efed6ce904c31f3b2f was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow via the function sfnt_init_face.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-27404` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.12.1+dfsg-2
libfreetype6 - 2.12.1+dfsg-2
No subscription required

notes.note: rodrigo-zaiden> vulnerable code was actually introduced in commit https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/freetype/freetype/-/commit/63765a8f (version 2.8), the commit in the description is the commit used to sync and test the reproducer.

criterions.comment: freetype package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.12.1+dfsg-2').
